channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump administration sues Maine over participation of transgender athletes in girls sports
item.description: The Trump administration is suing Maine’s education department for not complying with its push to ban transgender athletes in girls and women’s sports.

item.title: The Oklahoma City bombing was 30 years ago. Some survivors worry America didn’t learn the lesson
AP Was There: A truck bomb rips through a federal building in Oklahoma City in 1995
